cs.DM, cs.FL, cs.CC, cs.LO, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with a problem related to deterministic finite automata, which is a topic in discrete mathematics (cs.DM). The concept of reset words is also related to the study of formal languages (cs.FL). The problem of deciding the existence of a reset word is a decision problem, which is a topic in computational complexity theory (cs.CC). The paper also involves the use of graph theory, which is a topic in both discrete mathematics and theoretical computer science (cs.LO). Finally, the paper discusses the use of information theory to prove a lower bound, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT).
